description.lang: The Alarm.com Hub is a standalone home automation hub. It enables communication between home automation end-point devices and the Alarm.com cloud service via a cellular or Ethernet network. A user is able to remotely control functions on the Hub and its associated Alarm.com Interactive Services (including Z-Wave devices) via a web application or mobile app.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline - when the controller is reset (new home id, etc) it will send a DEVICE_RESET_LOCALLY_NOTIFICATION to all associated nodes.
